snippet.title: These predictions are written in ink
snippet.description:
Tuesday April 3, 2007 3:34 pm
Kenny Rogers, for the next three months. Oh, well. So it goes with expert predictions. But not this... Howard, Adam Dunn and Bobby Abreu. Juan Pierre will swing and miss about twice a week. Richie Sexson... entry music will be played in San Diego when Trevor Hoffman takes the mound to "Hells Bells." The almost-as-cool
